tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had a very positive experience with Dr. Varun. He was excellent in explaining the issues and communicated very well. The support staff were also amazing. However, the entire process took over 2 hours and 15 minutes, which is quite long. I suggest that if there is a 7 o'clock appointment, either the scheduling should be adjusted to reduce waiting times or the process streamlined to be more efficient. This would greatly improve the overall experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently underwent root canal treatment and implants at Dr Barun’s Dental Centre, Velachery, and I cannot express enough how impressed I am with the exceptional care and expertise provided by the entire team. From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere was warm and welcoming. The reception staff was friendly and efficient, making the check-in process a breeze. The clinic itself was clean, well-maintained, and adhered to the highest hygiene standards.Dr B.J Barun conducted a thorough examination and explained the root canal procedure and implant options in detail. Their professionalism and ability to communicate complex dental concepts in an understandable manner immediately put me at ease. Throughout the entire process, Dr. B J Barun demonstrated genuine concern for my comfort and well-being.The root canal treatment itself was virtually painless, thanks to the advanced technology and skilful hands of Dr B.J Barun. They took the time to ensure I was comfortable and regularly checked in on my well-being during the procedure. The attention to detail and precision in their work were truly impressive.The implant procedure was equally impressive. Dr B.J Barun handled the placement with utmost precision, and the results exceeded my expectations. The team ensured that I understood post-operative care instructions thoroughly, providing me with a comprehensive guide and answering all my questions.What sets this clinic apart is not only their technical expertise but also their commitment to patient care. The staff went above and beyond to accommodate my schedule for appointments and were always prompt in responding to any inquiries I had.The aftercare provided was excellent. I received follow-up calls to check on my recovery progress, and they were more than willing to address any concerns I had post-procedure. The entire experience has left me with a renewed confidence in my oral health.In conclusion, I highly recommend Dr Barun’s Dental Centre, Velachery for root canal treatment and implants. Dr. B.J Barun and the entire team have set a benchmark for dental care, combining expertise, compassion, and a patient-centric approach. If you're looking for a dental clinic that prioritizes your well-being and delivers outstanding results, look no further!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Recently, I had a consultation with Dr. Barun to ask about a tooth implantation. He replied that he is not doing the implantation procedure that I want. The sole purpose of my visit was to ask about the implantation and nothing else. Without informing me, he requested his assistant do a dental cleaning. I thought it would be a normal rate, and I did not object. After finishing the regular scaling, the assistant doctor told me that Dr. Barun ordered laser sterilization as well, and the doctor is on his way and requested me to wait. This was also against my wish, and he never explained to me the procedure, asked me whether I want laser sterilization, or told me how much it cost. The procedure was very painful, with a lot of anesthetic injections, and took about 30–45 minutes. Finally, he charged me Rs 35,000 for dental scaling and laser sterilization, ***** **** ******** ********* **** **** **** ** ******* He never explained to me what he was going to do or how much it would cost. Since I work abroad, ** ****** ********* *** I have medical insurance at my workplace, and I can do both of the procedures without paying any money. Since the zirconium implantation that I want is considered a cosmetic procedure and my insurance does not cover it, I consulted him.

** ********* ****** ** **** ** **** ******** ****** ****** **** ******* ** * ******** *** **** * **** **** I never recommend anyone to go there. ** * ********* my money got wasted for visiting this doctor, I got no solution from there.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Everything is fine except wait time which is unbearable . Very friendly doctor who explains everything properly - have been seeing for last 12!years

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Barun is absolutely Great at what he does. Very Efficient, Kind and Patient Friendly. **** ******** ********** He has been my Dentist for the past 10 years. Recently, My Mother had tooth issues went to a different Dentist and he had botched up the whole RCT procedure. She was in enormous pain, I took her to Dr.Barun and re-Root canal was required on all 4 teeths. All 4 were successfully done. My mother is relieved of pain now and is happy post treatment. Thank You Doctor. ****** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** ***** Kudos to the whole team at Dr.Barun's Velachery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
1. First of all direction is wrong and had to come around 4 kms from baby nagar to dandeeshwaram.

2. Mom had severe tooth ache. No other patients except us. Made us wait outside in the sun for more than 30 mins.

3. Made us fill so many forms. Why do we have practo with all details then?

4. Staffs are highly unprofessional with no basic customer service skills.**** ********** ***** ******* Sent below message to doctor and no response for past 3 days.

“My mom Santhi Arunmozhi, explained to you that she is allergic to Oviron *** **** ******** **** *** **** ******* ************ ** ************ *** ****** ******* ***** *** ********** *** *********** ** *********** *********** *** ********** *** **** ********* *** * **** *** *** ********** ******* *******

context: Impaction / Impacted Tooth Extraction,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: Visited for impacted wisdom tooth extraction and RCT of next teeth. Friendly doctor who's highly skilled. He's hands on working with patients every day (as opposed to another clinic in Velachery where the senior doctor was supervising the process). Wait time at the clinic was 30m to 1 hour from the appointment time, so plan ahead. The doctor could use a more skilled support staff to let him focus on his core work. Would definitely recommend him without hesitation.

Dr. Barun is highly professional and clear in what and how to give treatment to the respective dental problems. He also shows concession to his best. Now I am undergoing a dental implant dental surgery and it's not as I feared on the other hand I was very relaxed. I can simply say he is wonderful person, professional, *************, clear, very properly guiding the patient what is best for them in long run or in future.
